name: Sneaker TIME
description:
Put your sneaker wisdom to the test and compete on a global stage. "SneakerTIME" is the first app from SneakerToons and totallybueno. A simple, yet addictive game designed to test and ultimately improve your sneaker knowledge.

The app consists of four of categories and two game modes. You can play it safe by choosing your favourite. Air Max, Jordan, or Asics...or you can prove your ultimate knowledge by playing the random "mixed" category which contains all the top brands including Adidas, New Balance, Reebok and more!!!

In game one you will be faced with a SneakerToon of a classic shoe and three possible names. Pick the correct answer as fast as you can, for you only have 60 seconds to score the required 10 points, but beware. Any incorrect answer will lose you two points. If your on top of your Sneaker game, and your time was in the top ten. You will be able to write your name on the worldwide leaderboard!!!

In game two All you have to do is identify as many random SneakerToons as you can. Sounds easy, but any incorrect answer will end the game. See how long a chain of correct answers you can manage in order to make it on to the leaderboad.

With over 280 Sneakers Illustrated in the unmistakable SneakerToons style this game will keep you ,entertained,amused and guessing those sneakers for a long time....

TOP FEATURES

* Contains over 280 SneakerToons Illustrations
* Compete on a global Stage
* Improve your Classic Sneaker knowledge
* More sneakers will be added soon
